product.name: Lunsing Queen Mattress Protector, Soft Breathable Waterproof Queen Size Mattress Pad Cover, 6-18 inches Deep Pocket, White
product.description:
Do you eat or drink in bed regularly?
Does your child always have a night accident?
Do you often share your bed with pets?
Our mattress protector is a great partner for your sweet sleep!
product.bullet_points:
• Waterproof Protection: Lunsing mattress cover showcases an innovative waterproof layer, designed to repel stains, sweat, and spills. Ensure long lasting freshness and cleanliness for your bed
• Ultra Soft & Breathable: Made from soft-touch fabric, this mattress pad cover feels gentle on your skin while allowing airflow for a cool and comfortable night’s sleep
• Deep Pockets For Easy Fit: With a deep pocket design, the mattress cover fits most regular mattresses, staying secure even with active sleepers
• Family Favorite: Designed for families with kids, seniors, and pets, our mattress protector creates a comfortable, tidy, and secure sleep space
• Effortless Cleaning: Machine washable and dryer safe, this mattress cover makes cleanup after spills or daily use a breeze. Tips: do not iron, do not bleach, do not dry clean
